title: 服务器崩溃
author: xfgy1234
txt_content:
服务器突然崩溃，无法开启服务器，重启多次无效，而后发现是实体导致崩溃。把服务器存档载入到客户端中，可以正常游戏，然后在单人游戏中把崩溃实体杀掉，再把修改过的存档放进服务端，结果依然崩溃，但与之前错误报告不同。

以下是错误报告：
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Oops.


Time: 16-5-5 上午9:10
Description: Exception in server tick loop


java.lang.NullPointerException: A LittleWorld does not exist for reference world - The Second Survival
at net.slimevoid.littleblocks.proxy.CommonProxy.getLittleWorld(CommonProxy.java:88)
at net.slimevoid.littleblocks.tileentities.TileEntityLittleChunk.getLittleWorld(TileEntityLittleChunk.java:122)
at net.slimevoid.littleblocks.tileentities.TileEntityLittleChunk.setLittleWorldObjs(TileEntityLittleChunk.java:599)
at net.slimevoid.littleblocks.tileentities.TileEntityLittleChunk.func_145829_t(TileEntityLittleChunk.java:51)
at net.minecraft.world.chunk.Chunk.func_150812_a(Chunk.java:1007)
at net.minecraft.world.chunk.Chunk.func_150813_a(Chunk.java:969)
at net.minecraft.world.chunk.storage.AnvilChunkLoader.loadEntities(AnvilChunkLoader.java:551)
at net.minecraftforge.common.chunkio.ChunkIOProvider.callStage2(ChunkIOProvider.java:44)
at net.minecraftforge.common.chunkio.ChunkIOProvider.callStage2(ChunkIOProvider.java:15)
at net.minecraftforge.common.util.AsynchronousExecutor.skipQueue(AsynchronousExecutor.java:344)
at net.minecraftforge.common.util.AsynchronousExecutor.getSkipQueue(AsynchronousExecutor.java:302)
at net.minecraftforge.common.chunkio.ChunkIOExecutor.syncChunkLoad(ChunkIOExecutor.java:12)
at net.minecraft.world.gen.ChunkProviderServer.loadChunk(ChunkProviderServer.java:197)
at net.minecraft.world.gen.ChunkProviderServer.func_73158_c(ChunkProviderServer.java:170)
at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71222_d(MinecraftServer.java:480)
at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71247_a(MinecraftServer.java:445)
at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71197_b(DedicatedServer.java:336)
at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:631)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)




A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

replies.author: 我是小熊
replies.txt_content:
不要加 太多mod   服务器 承受不住 ｛要看配置｝
但是也容易 mod 冲突
你全部去掉
一点一点安装
那样的话冲突的话 可以直接拉出来删掉 
也不会出现现在一下子这么多 冲突的情况 
除非你 英文很好~ 
回答满意的话给 金粒

replies.author: 爱聪聪
replies.txt_content:
客户端和服务端的地图不一定是一样的,就算客户端可以加入到服务器,物品的ID也有可能不一样
最好的办法就是用mcedit编辑删除问题实体

replies.author: XC_God
replies.txt_content: 可能是小方块MOD的问题，这里的报错有提到littleworld
